summary: Increased character\'s height for the 1st person camera view
descriptionHtml:
- [color=orange]01/24/2012[/color] : Added an optional file for exact 1st person scale for races : Argonians males, High Elves, Nords, Orcs and Redguards males. -

[SIZE=4][color=green]Description[/color][/SIZE]
-----------------------
This modification Increase the character\'s height for the 1st person camera view only.
That doesnt change the height of your character in the 3rd person view.

[SIZE=4][color=green]Installation [/color][/SIZE]
-----------------------
1. Extract the folder [color=grey]\"Meshes\"[/color] In your Skyrim [color=grey]\"Data\" [/color]folder.

2. You have now the Skeleton scale 1.05x.

[color=red]To use another Height[/color], choose one of the included .nif files with the scale you want. Then, rename it to [color=grey]\" skeleton.nif \"[/color] and replace the [color=grey]\" skeleton.nif \"[/color] that is currently inside [color=grey]Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/_1stperson[/color].

Example:

The newly installed skeleton.nif has a scale of 1.05, but you want a scale of 1.10.

1. Go to [color=grey]Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/_1stperson[/color]
2. Delete or rename the default [color=grey]\" skeleton.nif \"[/color]
3. Rename [color=grey]\" skeleton1.10.nif \"[/color] to [color=grey]\" skeleton.nif \"[/color] .

Done! Your scale is now 1.10x. 

[SIZE=4][color=green]Uninstallation[/color][/SIZE]
-----------------------
To completly uninstall the mod delete the folder [color=grey]\" _1stperson \"[/color] located in [color=grey]\" ...\\Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\actors\\character\\ \"[/color].

[SIZE=4][color=green]Infos[/color][/SIZE]
-----------------------
The vanilla scale is 1.00.

 [color=green]Available Height scale[/color]

skeleton1.01
skeleton1.02
skeleton1.05 [color=grey]-- installed by default[/color]
skeleton1.10
skeleton1.15
skeleton1.20
skeleton1.25
skeleton1.30
skeleton1.35
skeleton1.40

 [color=green]Changing the 3rd Person Height (optional)[/color]

If you want, you can change the 3rd person scale ingame with this console command :

[color=grey]player.setscale X[/color]

( \"X\" is the scale you want to use. 1.00 is the game default )
author: Kacemus
